abstract.para: WDB is a data storage solution for weather and water data based on the PostgreSQL object-relational database system. The system utilizes PostGIS for GIS (Geographic Information Systems) support and handles regular grids (e.g., forecast fields) and point (e.g., observation) data.
This is the User's Manual for the Loading Programs of WDB version &version;

chapter.title: Loading Programs
chapter.para: This document contains reference information for the loading programs of WDB. The loading programs are client applications used to decode data encoded in the various official (&grib;, BUFR, etc.) and private (KvalObs, &felt;) input formats and store them in the WDB system.
